column8: Wisconsin Virtual Phone Bank with Swing Left Chicago
column9:
Wisconsin may be the decisive state in the upcoming general election. For this phone bank, we'll be calling Wisconsin voters in crucial state assembly districts.

By helping to elect more Democrats to the Wisconsin state assembly, we can ensure that Wisconsin Dems can block Republican gerrymandering in the coming years. These calls also mobilize voters to vote for Biden in November.

In 2016, Hillary Clinton lost Wisconsin by less than 1%. We can't afford to lose Wisconsin's electoral votes again in 2020. Voter contact is the key and during a pandemic, phone banks are the best form of voter contact.

A few things to keep in mind when you attend this virtual phone bank:

Don’t worry if you’ve never done something like this before. We’ll provide a phone script and a list of voters to call.

You’ll need a phone and a laptop computer or tablet to make calls

column9:

column8: Boulder August Weekend of Action Virtual Phone Bank
column9:
Colorado needs your help! Making phone calls is an amazing way to help elect Democrats up and down the ballot while staying socially distant.

We especially welcome first-time volunteers, who would like to join a historic grassroots movement across our country. All you need is internet access and a laptop (or tablet, if you have one).

Before your shift starts, your local organizer will reach out to give you all the training you need to start phone banking. We will get you set up, walk through how our phone banks work, give you a script to help guide your conversations, and answer any questions you might have.

RSVP now, and invite a friend to join you!

column8: 8/12 WED @5 ET: Write Voter Turnout Letters with Swing Left Target 2020 NYC
column9:
At this virtual party, we'll write letters to Dem voters in a critical Swing State. It's an award-winning, proven tactic from a Swing Left affiliate, Vote Forward -- we’re writing these letters now then mailing them come fall.

If we can’t knock on doors, research suggests these letters may be the BEST way to turn out voters in tight races all over the country.

Think about it: if you help get a voter to the polls in one of our targeted Super States, you can deliver a vote for Biden and also possibly a Senate seat, plus impact key State races necessary to roll back gerrymanders.

That’s what Swing Left's Super State Strategy is all about: identifying the voters we need to reach to maximize the impact of your time and money. We look forward to seeing you!

IMPORTANT NOTE: If you can’t print letters, sign up for one of Swing Left National's parties at the following link and ask if they can mail you a set! https://swingleft.org/p/swing-lefts-national-virtual-letter-writing-party

By clicking RSVP, you agree to Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement:
https://swingleft.org/p/liability

column8: 8/15 SAT @4 ET: Help Elect Anton Andrew in PA160--SWING LEFT PHONEBANK
column9:
We are so excited to keep supporting our group's "adopted" PA State House candidate, Anton Andrew. Join us and see why we love Anton, and why we will be supporting him all the way to November.

Don’t worry if you’ve never done something like this before. All you need is a phone and a computer or tablet. By RSVPing for this event, you’ll get everything you need.

We’ll share your sign-up info (including email) with our partners at Anton’s campaign. Training starts at 4, then we all mute ourselves and dial till 6. (If you’re an experienced phonebanker, we’ll get you dialing asap!)

We’ll be talking to swing voters whose support will be crucial to help Anton flip House District 160 in Chester & Delaware Counties. With every call, we will help Team Anton to raise name recognition, identify supporters, and sign up Dems to Vote by Mail. We’ll even help support other Dem wins in every race, up and down the ballot!

By clicking RSVP, you agree to Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement: https://swingleft.org/p/liability

column8: ICT4/Swing Left CT Phone Bank Training for New or Reluctant Phonebankers
column9:
Are you a new or reluctant phone banker?  If so, we have the event for you!  Join Swing Left and ICT4 for this informative phone bank training, ending with the opportunity to call voters in FL!

We’re excited to offer a special phone banking training led by Colleen McCarthy, a Swing Left National program manager.  The goal of this event will be to give you background on why phone banking is important, best practices for phone banking, and make sure you are set up on the technology to be able to make calls by the end of the event.

Calling voters is a key way to help win the White House, the Senate, and the state-level races key to rolling back Republican gerrymandering.  Our phone banking training will help you develop this essential skill.  Don’t worry if you’ve never done something like this before. You will also get a chance to practice your new skills by calling some voters.  All you need to provide is a phone and a laptop computer or tablet to make calls.  Remember, if we do things right, we’ll not only beat Trump and the GOP—we’ll set up the country for a decade of progressive wins!

By clicking RSVP, you agree to the Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement (https://swingleft.org/liability) and the guidelines described in Swing Left's Community Agreements (https://swingleft.org/community-agreements).

WHAT YOU'LL NEED TO PHONE BANK

column8: Virtual Weekend of Action: Call Swing Voters in Key Congressional Districts!
column9:
**Pick a shift (or two) during our virtual weekend of action to call swing voters** in support of Joe Biden and Democrats at every level. This weekend, we'll focus our support on four key congressional races: Matt Cartwright (PA-08), Eugene DePasquale (PA-10), Kristy Gnibus (PA-16), and Conor Lamb (PA-17)!


WHAT YOU'LL NEED
—A computer with reliable internet service
—A mobile or landline phone
—A comfy, quiet place in your home

----------
GETTING STARTED

We recommend opening the phone bank and getting set up fifteen minutes before your schedule start time—so you can focus on having good conversations for your full shift!

If your primary internet browser is Apple Safari, the platform we use will not work. Please use a recent version of Chrome or Firefox to access the link.

----------
FIRST TIME CALLER?

No problem! We welcome all volunteers and are happy to train first-time phone bankers. Please follow these three steps to get going:

1) [Learn how to make calls ](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Oj621RtwtCfUvO4MZWycZ2bSXbnmXJoJo0P8qX8SMvA/edit?usp=sharing)

2) [Make calls to PA voters](https://www.thrutalk.io/caller/login/dem2020victory)

3) [Join our remote volunteer community Slack for live support!](https://join.slack.com/t/back2bluepa/shared_invite/zt-fq3zpakh-8VR4X3jm0IY0G8j7YETpQg)

Also, feel free to [sign up for a virtual training](https://www.mobilize.us/backtobluepa/event/267684/) before you start making calls!

column8: Convention Kick Off: Get to Know Joe!
column9:
It's convention week! That means Democrats all accross the country are getting together to celebrate Joe Biden and his VP! But what do you really know about Joe? Join your PA Dems organizer for the third night of the convention. Submit what you want to know about Joe and join volunteers who have been talking to voters about the Vice President for months. We will delve into his policies, his incredible life story, hear from volunteers about their experiences talking about Biden on the phones, and hear about what brings each of us to fighting for Biden. This event is a great way for current volunteers to learn new skills and a great place to start for someone interested in volunteering. Bring your questions, your stories, your excitement, and your friends!

 If you have any accessibility needs, please let Iris know by emailing iris.feldman@2020Victory.com or calling/texting 415-314-9146 so that we can make sure the meeting will be accessible and comfortable for you. Zoom link sent out the morning of the event.

All experience levels welcome! Looking forward to seeing you.

column8: Swing Left East Bay Virtual Phone Bank - August 17 (LD 20)
column9:
When you call Arizona voters, you get triple the payoff, as Arizona is key for flipping both the Senate and presidency and is also ripe for flipping the state legislature. We will be making calls to Arizona voters in specific legislative districts that are key to flipping the State Legislature to prevent gerrymandering, which will influence national politics for a decade.

Don’t worry if you’ve never done something like this before. We’ll provide a phone script and a list of voters to call along with all the training you need.

You’ll need a phone and a laptop computer or tablet to make calls.

column8: 8/19 WED @5 ET: Write Voter Turnout Letters with Swing Left Target 2020 NYC
column9:
At this virtual party, we'll write letters to Dem voters in a critical Swing State. It's an award-winning, proven tactic from a Swing Left affiliate, Vote Forward -- we’re writing these letters now then mailing them come fall.

If we can’t knock on doors, research suggests these letters may be the BEST way to turn out voters in tight races all over the country.

Think about it: if you help get a voter to the polls in one of our targeted Super States, you can deliver a vote for Biden and also possibly a Senate seat, plus impact key State races necessary to roll back gerrymanders.

That’s what Swing Left's Super State Strategy is all about: identifying the voters we need to reach to maximize the impact of your time and money. We look forward to seeing you!

IMPORTANT NOTE: If you can’t print letters, sign up for one of Swing Left National's parties at the following link and ask if they can mail you a set! https://swingleft.org/p/swing-lefts-national-virtual-letter-writing-party

By clicking RSVP, you agree to Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement:
https://swingleft.org/p/liability

column8: Wine Women Wednesday: Democratic National Convention 2020 Monroe County Virtual Watch Party

You don’t have to be a woman and you don’t have to drink wine, you just need to be a BIDEN/HARRIS supporter who wants to have some fun!

column8: Bucks County Convention Week "Whisper Down the Lane"
column9:
Get ready for Bucks County's largest game of virtual "Whisper Down the Lane".  Join the PADems as we celebrate convention week by connecting Democrats in the county in a new, fun way.  Use your phone to receive the special convention week message and pass it on to another Bucks County Biden supporter.  You could get called by a local Democratic celebrity!

We will wrap up the night on Zoom at 6pm for some laughs and reveal the original message!  It's a great way to start building excitement for convention week.

Stay for Convention Week Trivia!  Wear your favorite Democratic gear on Zoom to see who wins an assortment of Biden/VP buttons.

column8: Swing TX Left Welcomes Rep. Lizzie Fletcher
column9:
This is where we started y'all; working CD7 to oust John Culberson and flip the House. A little over two years ago we had a unity party for Lizzie Fletcher and now she has spent over a year and a half representing us in Washington DC.

Join us to hear from her about what it has meant that we flipped the House and how we can support her re-election in November 2020.

We will also fill you in on what Swing TX Left has going these days.

column8: Dems of SLO Virtual Letter Writing with Swing Left SLO
column9:
It's time to get to work on 2020! Even though lots of us are isolated right now to protect our communities, we can still get together virtually to make an impact! Join me for a virtual letter writing party, where we'll be writing letters to potential voters in a critical election. This award-winning, proven tactic will help us work on crucial races all over the country!

RSVP here, and we’ll let you know how to join this party online. Invite your friends, too and let them know that Swing Left is pioneering an innovative program, using letters to help volunteers like us turn out Super State voters by mail with our letter-writing affiliate, Vote Forward.

Never written letters before? Hop on to votefwd.org and make an account; download twenty letters; and we’ll show you how to write them at our virtual party!

Think about it: if you help get a voter to the polls in one of our targeted Super States, you can impact key State races necessary to roll back gerrymanders. That’s what Swing Left's Super State Strategy is all about: maximizing the impact of your time and money! Looking forward to seeing you!

column8: Western Erie County Community Phone Bank!
column9:
Join us for a virtual phone bank to talk with voters about electing Pennsylvania Democrats up and down the ballot! We will all join a Zoom call and dial at the same time, so we can mimic the experience of an in-person phonebanking event!

The most effective way for us to reach voters right now is through phone calls, and we need you to help us get the word out to make sure Democrats can have their voices heard.

WHAT YOU'LL NEED
— A computer with reliable internet service
— A mobile or landline phone
— A comfy, quiet place in your home

To get started, we recommend opening the phone bank and getting set up a few minutes before your scheduled start time so you can focus on having good conversations for your full shift. We recommend using a recent version of Chrome or Firefox as your internet browser to access the link.

We'll send you the phone bank link ahead of your shift!

column8: Necessary Trouble Phone Bank
column9:
We're making calls on Saturday for Carolyn Bourdeaux, our Congressional candidate in CD7. On Sunday, we'll make calls for candidate Nakita Hemingway for Georgia State House 104. We'll use the Zoom teleconferencing app for orientation and training, then make calls using the candidate's Virtual Phone Bank application. We'll help you get set up on your home computer, then you can make as many or as few calls as you like--or call at another time if you prefer. While we're calling we can communicate with each other using the Zoom chat window (sound muted).

A few things to keep in mind when you attend this virtual phone bank:

Don’t worry if you’ve never done something like this before. We’ll provide a phone script and a list of voters to call.

You’ll need a phone and a laptop computer or tablet to make calls

By clicking RSVP, you agree to the Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement (https://swingleft.org/liability) and the guidelines described in Swing Left's Community Agreements (https://swingleft.org/community-agreements).

column8: Swing Left Texas Kickoff
column9:
Now that the Texas primaries have finally wrapped up, it's time to ramp up our work to flip Texas blue. Even though lots of us are isolated right now to protect our communities, we can still get together virtually to make an impact.

Join Swing Left staff and volunteers from across Texas and the country to talk about what's at stake in Texas (a lot!), how we'll win, and how you can get started.

We'll discuss the specific races that are most critical this fall - to prevent Republican Gerrymandering, flip the Senate, and to win the White House - and specific actions you can take from home starting now. We'll also talk about ways grassroots groups can organize their communities and resources Swing Left offers to support their work.

RSVP here, and we’ll let you know how to join this party online. Invite your friends, too, so they can be part of Swing Left's plan to win Texas and all of the Super States this fall.

By clicking RSVP, you agree to Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement: https://swingleft.org/p/liability

column8: Phonebanking 101: Training to call voters with Indivisible Oregon
column9:
So, you've been hearing that calling voters is critical to defeating Trumpism in 2020 -- but you’ve never done it before, and not sure where to start.  Maybe you're even feeling a bit nervous. We’re here for you!

We’re volunteers who have not only been through it and lived to tell the tale -- we helped win critical elections.  We want to share with you what we’ve learned, so together we can win big in 2020.

Join us for a 30-minute training and we'll transform you from nervous newbie to comfortable, confident dialmaster.  If you like, when you're done, you can step right into a party to call swing voters in Arizona, alongside experienced compatriots who will share their savvy.  You can sign up here: https://www.mobilize.us/arizonald17/event/280833/

By clicking RSVP, you agree to the Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement (https://swingleft.org/liability) and the guidelines described in Swing Left's Community Agreements (https://swingleft.org/community-agreements).

column8: **Politicians & Musicians** Letter Writing Party with Brandy Chambers for HD-112
column9:
ZOOM LINK for tonight's event: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85805784094

Join us for an entertaining night of letter writing to get out the vote in Texas with HD-112 candidate Brandy Chambers and a musical performance from Harry Edohoukwa!

*Sponsored by Swing Left Austin, the Texas Democratic Party and Blue Action Democrats*

BEFORE THE EVENT

1) Register to write letters through the Vote Forward platform. (It can take several days to get approved, so make sure you do this in advance!) 👉🏽votefwd.org/swingleft

2) Once you're approved to send letters, request to adopt voters under their 2 Texas-targeted campaigns (we recommend selecting 20 voters for the length of our event). 👉🏽votefwd.org/district/TXGOTV2020A 👉🏽votefwd.org/district/TXGOTV2020B

3) Print the letter templates out, and make sure you have enough envelopes and stamps ahead of the event.

4) We'll discuss how to personalize the messages to voters during our Virtual Letter Writing Party for TX Voter Turnout!

Vote Forward and Swing Left volunteers send heartfelt handwritten letters to unregistered and low-propensity voters encouraging them to participate in our democracy. The letters have been shown to significantly boost voter turnout.

AFTER THE EVENT

Store the letters in a safe place until it's time to mail them out in mid-October!

By clicking RSVP, you agree to the Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement (https://swingleft.org/liability) and the guidelines described in Swing Left's Community Agreements (https://swingleft.org/community-agreements).

column8: Letter Writing with GW Leading Women of Tomorrow and Swing Left GWU
column9:
Join GW Leading Women of Tomorrow and Swing Left GWU for a virtual letter writing party, where we'll be writing letters to get out the vote in this critical election. We'll also be watching And She Could Be Next, a documentary about women of color who ran for office in 2018 to transform our government!

RSVP here, and we’ll let you know how to join this party online. Invite your friends, too, and let them know it's a great opportunity to have fun, connect with the GW community, and make a difference this year.

IMPORTANT TO DO BEFORE THE EVENT STARTS: If you have never written letters before, hop on to votefwd.org and make an account; download twenty letters; and we’ll show you how to write them at our virtual party!

column8: Weekend Phonebank for Julie Slomski and the Pennsylvania Democrats!
column9:
Phone bank from your home for Julie Slomski!

This race is the top priority for flipping the Pennslyvania State Senate and we need your help to win!

Julie was just endorsed by former President Barack Obama and we need to use this momentum to inform voters about Julie and the other great Democrats and make sure they have all the information they need about Vote by Mail.

This is a crucial election for Pennslyvania, and if you want to see real progressive change happen, this is your time to help make it possible!

Training and materials will be provided beforehand and someone on staff will be available to answer any questions during your shift!

So, please join us in taking back our Democracy!

column8: Weekend Phone Bank for Doylestown
column9:
Join us for a virtual phone bank to talk with voters in Doylestown Pennsylvania about electing Pennsylvania Democrats up and down the ballot!

The most effective way for us to reach voters right now is through phone calls, and we need you to help us get the word out to make sure Democrats can have their voices heard.

WHAT YOU'LL NEED
— A computer with reliable internet service
— A mobile or landline phone
 — A comfy, quiet place in your home

To get started, we recommend opening the phone bank and getting set up a few minutes before your scheduled start time so you can focus on having good conversations for your full shift. We recommend using a recent version of Chrome or Firefox as your internet browser to access the link.

We encourage all active and prospective phone bankers to [join our remote volunteer community Slack for live support](https://join.slack.com/t/back2bluepa/shared_invite/zt-fq3zpakh-8VR4X3jm0IY0G8j7YETpQg).

Learn how to use an Open Virtual Phone Bank [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19rHzEZYmNiYi_mZoX8-_rLWNKbchYwR1/view). We will send you the phone bank link ahead of your shift!

column8: Learn to Write Letters with Vote Forward!
column9:
It's time to get to work on 2020! Even though lots of us are isolated right now to protect our communities, we can still get together virtually to make an impact! Join me for a virtual letter writing training, where you'll learn to writing letters to potential voters in a critical election. This award-winning, proven tactic will help us work on crucial races all over the country!

RSVP here, and we’ll let you know how to join this party online. Invite your friends, too and let them know that Swing Left is pioneering an innovative program, using letters to help volunteers like us turn out Super State voters by mail with our letter-writing affiliate, Vote Forward.

Think about it: if you help get a voter to the polls in one of our targeted Super States, you can impact key State races necessary to roll back gerrymanders. That’s what Swing Left's Super State Strategy is all about: maximizing the impact of your time and money! Looking forward to seeing you!

This training will be about 30-40 minutes and will teach you to help save our democracy from home!

column8: Wisconsin Voter Protection Phone Bank with Swing Left Chicago
column9:
Wisconsin may be the decisive state in the upcoming general election. For this phone bank, we'll be helping our friends at the Democratic Party of Wisconsin with their voter protection recruitment.

Poll workers and poll observers are absolutely crucial in a state like Wisconsin with a bad record of voter suppression. By assisting the DPW in the recruitment and coordination of voter protection volunteers, we're helping to keep Wisconsin's elections fair and safe.

A few things to keep in mind when you attend this virtual phone bank:

Don’t worry if you’ve never done something like this before. We’ll provide a phone script and a list of voters to call.

You’ll need a phone and a laptop computer or tablet to make calls

column8: SPEAK OUT THE VOTE FUNDRAISER! From CA to AZ with Love and Hope
column9:
This is our time. This is our challenge. This is our mandate . . .

	To speak truth to power about the injustices wrought by Donald Trump and his corrupt administration

	To make our voices heard by taking to the streets and taking to the polls

	To work feverishly to save our country and our democracy by winning back the Presidency and Senate, keeping the House and turning red legislatures blue

	To raise funds to support our cause.

SPEAK OUT THE VOTE is Swing Left San Gabriel Valley’s (SL SGV) first virtual fundraiser to  help us meet our challenge and fulfill our mandate. As part of Swing Left’s Adopt-A-State program, we've adopted Arizona. This means that our team will spend most of our energy writing letters, phone banking, text banking and fundraising for elections in this state. The proceeds we receive from all of you will be split between the Flippable AZ Fund and Mark Kelly. Please donate at swingleft.org/fundraise/speakoutthevote_az. If you’re financially able, a contribution of $10/person is recommended.  If you’re in a position to give more, we hope you’ll consider doing so.

At SPEAK OUT THE VOTE, you'll hear from several political figures and members of the entertainment industry.

As Joe Biden says, “We’re in a battle for the soul of our nation.”  Please join us.

By clicking RSVP, you agree to the Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement (https://swingleft.org/liability) and the guidelines described in Swing Left's Community Agreements (https://swingleft.org/community-agreements).

column8: Write Letters or Postcards to Voters Virtually with UWS MoveOn/Indivisible/Swing Left chapter!
column9:
While on zoom together we'll all be writing either letters with Vote Forward or postcards with Reclaim Our Vote.
Use this link to join the zoom meeting on Saturday, Aug 15 at 2pm -  https://zoom.us/j/97714981197
If you're doing letter writing, you need to get an account with Vote Forward to download letters using your home printer. Most of you've already registered, but those who haven't need to do that 24 hours in advance of our 2pm meeting.
If you want to write postcards, you need to email me to order them in advance and they will be ready for pick up in my lobby [240 W 98th St] shortly after you email me. Each packet of 30 postcards with stamps and everything you need is $15. Please email me at ageiger3@nyc.rr.com if you need to order postcards I have just a few left for now.

Vote Forward is a pioneering an innovative program, using letters to help volunteers like us turn out Super State voters by mail which is affiliated with Swing Left.

Think about it: if you help get a voter to the polls in one of our targeted Super States, you can impact key State races necessary to roll back gerrymanders. That’s what Swing Left's Super State Strategy is all about: maximizing the impact of your time and money! Looking forward to seeing you!

column8: Voters of the Future Phonebank for Joe Biden
column9:
Join us for a virtual phone bank to the voters of Washington County about electing Democrats up and down the ballot in the County! We'll also chat about why voting for Democrats is important for securing our futures when it comes to the issues that young folks face including student loan debt and climate change! This phone bank will only call young folks, and we encourage future voters and young folks in Washington County to sign up -- let's talk to our peers before the youngest woman to ever serve in congress, AOC, takes the convention floor to speak!

The most effective way for us to reach voters right now is through phone calls, and we need you to help us get the word out to make sure Democrats can have their voices heard.

WHAT YOU'LL NEED
— A computer with reliable internet service
— A mobile or landline phone
 — A comfy, quiet place in your home

NCDP Field Organizers will lead the training, discuss our program, answer any questions you may have, and get you scheduled to start making calls!

You should receive a confirmation email with instructions to join the Zoom call after you RSVP. If you don't see it at first, check your spam folder. If you still cannot locate the email, reach out to Mallory Warner at mallory.warner@2020victory.com.

Now is the time for us to turn NC BLUE! Sign up now and let's win!

column8: Weekend of Action in Tucson!
column9:
We need your help during our Statewide Virtual Weekend of Action talking to voters about the importance of voting by mail in 2020. A phone bank is a great way to reach voters and talk about issues we all care about.

With the importance placed on Arizona this November, we need to reach out and talk to voters about Joe Biden, Mark Kelly and AZ Dems now, even as we practice social distancing. Virtual phone banks have become an essential part of turning Arizona blue, and every phonbanker plays a pivotal role. This will be our biggest weekend yet as a campaign, and we need your help.

Whether you’re new to campaigns or an expert, you have a place with our people-powered campaign. The good news is, phone banking is easy to learn and can be done from the comfort of your own home!

You will need a phone (and a laptop or tablet, if you have one). Prior to your phonebanking shift, your local organizer will reach out for a comprehensive training, where we’ll get you set up, walk you through our phonebanking process and script, and answer any questions you might have.

Volunteers will help Mission for Arizona unite Democrats across Arizona and build upon our historic success in 2018 to elect Mark Kelly and Democrats up and down the ticket.

RSVP today and invite a friend to join us!

column8: Women For Biden Roundtable
column9:
On Thursday, August 13, following the historic announcement that Senator Kamala Harris has been selected as Biden’s running mate, join Congresswoman Chrissy Houlahan, Congresswoman Mary Gay Scanlon, Congresswoman Madeleine Dean, and Dr. Nina Ahmad for a virtual Women for Biden event in Pennsylvania, moderated by Blayre-Holmes Davis, Commissioner on Pennsylvania Governor Tom Wolf's Commission on Women, to discuss the impact the Senator’s appointment will have on a Biden administration, the Biden Agenda for Women, and Biden’s long history of championing women’s issues. The Congresswomen will also discuss the key role Pennsylvanian women will play in electing the Biden-Harris ticket in November.

Recording: Biden for President will be recording this event and may use the recording in Campaign communications and other materials. By participating, I confirm my understanding that this recording will occur and grant any requisite consent, therefore, I also grant to the Campaign the permission to use my name, likeness, image, and voice, in any and all manner and media and for any purpose without compensation.

Accessibility: To request reasonable accommodations to this event, please fill out this form: https://joe.link/3c9bE4D

column8: Swing Left Michigan Kickoff
column9:
Now that Michigan primary has wrapped up, it's time to ramp up our work in Michigan. Even though lots of us are isolated right now to protect our communities, we can still get together virtually to make an impact. Join Swing Left staff and volunteers from across Michigan and the country to talk about what's at stake in Michigan, how we'll win, and how you can get started.

We'll discuss the specific races that are most critical this fall - to win the White House and protect non-partisan redistricting in Michigan by flipping the Statehouse - and specific actions you can take from home starting now. We'll also talk about ways grassroots groups can organize their communities and resources Swing Left offers to support their work.

RSVP here, and we’ll let you know how to join this party online. Invite your friends, too, so they can be part of Swing Left's plan to win Michigan and all of the Super States this fall.

By registering for an event, you agree to the Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement (https://swingleft.org/liability) and the guidelines described in Swing Left's Community Agreements (https://swingleft.org/community-agreements).

column8: Swing Left East Bay Virtual Phone Bank - August 12th (LD-28)
column9:
When you call Arizona voters, you get triple the payoff, as Arizona is key for flipping both the Senate and presidency and is also ripe for flipping the state legislature.

We will be making calls on behalf of three candidates for state office.  Two incumbent State Representatives seeking re-election, one who won by only 2,000 votes last time, and one new candidate running for State Senate.  Each legislative district elects two candidates to the State House, and one to the State Senate.

A few things to keep in mind when you attend this virtual phone bank:

Don’t worry if you’ve never done something like this before. We’ll provide a phone script and a list of voters to call.

You’ll need a phone and a laptop computer or tablet to make calls

column8: SLSF: Aug. 18 & 25 Spanish for Phone Banking
column9:
Do you speak Spanish AND want to reclaim our democracy? This two-part workshop will teach you strategies for engaging in meaningful conversations with voters who are most comfortable speaking Spanish. We’ll include specific vocabulary and tips on phone etiquette to help you navigate the critical first 30 seconds of a phone conversation – including phrases that communicate respect and help you earn voters’ trust. We’ll also cover topics from current phone banks, including wellness checks and encouraging vote-by-mail.

This interactive class will be co-taught by a native Spanish-speaking language instructor and an experienced phone banker. This is an intermediate-level class and will be conducted mostly in Spanish. Some experience with phone banking is preferred but not required. We’re keeping the class size small, so please only sign up if you can commit to attending the whole workshop.

If you’d like a sneak preview, or want to see if this workshop is appropriate for your level of Spanish, check out our class videos.

Tuesday, Aug. 18 and Tuesday, Aug. 25 from 7:00-9:00 pm Pacific Time (Please attend both sessions). RSVP by Sunday, Aug. 16 (space is limited)

(Questions? Interested in this workshop but can’t attend this one? Please email Elizabeth Chur at peregrina2003@gmail.com.)

By clicking RSVP, you agree to Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement.

column8: WI AAPIs for Biden Launch with Rep. Grace Meng, Attorney General Josh Kaul and Michelle Kwan
column9:
On Thursday, August 13, Congresswoman Grace Meng, a Democratic National Committee Vice Chair, Attorney General Josh Kaul and former Olympic medalist and figure skater Michelle Kwan will host a kick off event for Wisconsin Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders (AAPIs) for Biden, a statewide coalition of AAPI elected officials, community leaders and members.

Also joining the launch will be Biden for President National AAPI Vote Director Amit Jani and Wisconsin AAPIs for Biden Co-Chairs May yer Thao and Angelito Tenorio. In the months leading up to the election, the coalition will organize and mobilize Wisconsin AAPI voters across the Badger State on behalf of Joe Biden.

A link to join the Zoom will be provided upon RSVP.

column8: Young Dems Phone Bank Training!
column9:

We're making Tuesday (8/18) the DAY for young Democrats in Westmoreland County beginning with this training, to making calls to swing voters all day, to hearing AOC speak at the Democratic Convention at night. Upon signing up, you will receive a link to join our call.

Democrats across the commonwealth are fighting for keystone issues like access to healthcare, better jobs, and protecting our environment, and we need your help to ensure we can turn Pennsylvania back to blue in November.

If you have any accessibility needs, please let Cayla Kaplan know by emailing cayla.kaplan@2020victory.com or calling/texting (310)292-2249 so that we can make sure the meeting will be accessible and comfortable for you.

Control of the White House and US Senate could be decided by our neighbors in Arizona.  We need them to vote.  They need us to move them ALL to vote via letters, phone calls and texts.  NOW is the time.
After the meeting we will have a brief phone bank training and opportunity to call Arizona Democrats.  This direct voter contact is the best way to get voters to commit.  Please sign up for this action here: https://www.mobilize.us/swingleft/event/296756/

column8: "Virtual Canvassing" (aka Phonebanking) Training
column9:
We need to fight voter suppression to win the White House, the Senate, and the state-level races key to rolling back Republican gerrymandering. If we do things right, we’ll set up the country for a decade of progressive wins!

Since we can't go door-to-door to meet voters in person this year, calling them is the next best thing. Many are grateful for the personal contact and help overcoming GOP voter suppression efforts.

Join Barb Miller for an easy 30 minute training session to make calls for Reclaim Our Vote, a non-partisan non-profit calling communities of color. Then join her for a virtual phone bank or begin making calls on your own.


By clicking RSVP, you agree to the Swing Left’s Organizer Liability Statement (https://swingleft.org/liability) and the guidelines described in Swing Left's Community Agreements (https://swingleft.org/community-agreements).

column8: Write Letters to Voters Virtually with Indivisible Oregon and Swing Left!
column9:
Indivisible Oregon’s letter writing parties are going virtual!!

Just because we are at home doesn’t mean we can’t get together virtually to make an impact. Join us for a virtual letter writing party, where we'll be writing letters to potential voters in a critical election. This award-winning, proven tactic will help us work on crucial races all over the country!

Once you RSVP, you’ll get an email with instructions on downloading and printing your letters through Vote Forward, along with the link to join the Zoom meeting. If you haven’t downloaded your own letters before, we promise it’s easy - and we’re here to help if you have any trouble.

column8: SLSF: Aug. 22 Phone Bank Training for Introverts (and Friends)
column9:
Are you on the fence about phone banking?

In this interactive and supportive training (led by three introverts-who-phone-bank) we’ll demonstrate that you already have key skills--like the ability to listen thoughtfully and have meaningful one-to-one connections. And we’ll build on those skills by talking about phone banking challenges, and sharing some tips that really work. Join us!

Saturday August 22nd. 1pm*- 3pm Pacific. RSVP by August 20th (space is limited)

*(if you need help using Zoom, please join early at 12:45pm)  

NOTE: This is NOT a phone bank. It's a training specifically for those who are thinking about making calls to voters, but don't quite feel ready.
